name: Onryō: Vengeful Spirit
description:
A game created in 10 days for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

**UPDATE**

  • I have updated a second file now called Onryo GJ2022 BUILD.rar. This file is the game folder as build by unity, so download and unzip that to play the game.
  • The second original file, Onryo.rar is the entire unity project, source code included. With the exe build inside.
  • Screenshots have also been added

**UPDATE**

- Controls

  • Attack/Possess (only when orb) = 
    • X Button (PS4)
    • A Button (Xbox)
    • X Key(Keyboard)
  • Kill Host = 
    • Square Button  (PS4)
    • X Button (Xbox)
    • Space Bar (Keyboard)
  • Jump =
    • O Button (PS4)
    • B Button (Xbox)
    • C Key (Keyboard)
  • Reload Level =
    • Left Shoulder (PS4 and Xbox)
    • R (Keyboard)
  • Quit =
    • Right Shoulder (PS4 and Xbox)
    • Q (Keyboard)

- Story

It is the 16th century. A time of great turmoil. The once peaceful province of Yamato is in disrepair and rumours of a vast gang of dangerous bandits are said to roam the area, stealing from innocent victims and killing them in the process. Their latest victim is, however, a little different... a shrine maiden.

Assume the role of a guardian spirit in search of divine retribution. Exact revenge on those who took your life by eliminating them and decide a new fate for yourself and the land.

- Inhabit any one of the gang members to defeat your enemies

- Unique controls let you switch characters when you want

- Experiment with the three hosts types to suit your playing style

- Gameplay

You start the game as the orb, and you have a life force which is slowly draining away. Hover over an enemy and press the attack/possess button to posses them. Then as that enemy rampage about the level killing other enemies.

You can kill your host at any time and fly off to find a new host, but keep an eye on the orb energy at the top left, when that's gone it's game over.

Continue until all enemies are dead
